H0.text: The English cities of Gloucester and Worcester are on which river. Thames

H1.text: The English cities of Gloucester and Worcester are on which river. Avon

H2.text: The English cities of Gloucester and Worcester are on which river. Trent

H3.text: The English cities of Gloucester and Worcester are on which river. Severn

A4.text: The county towns of Shrewsbury, Worcester and Gloucester lie on its course.

A5.text: The River Severn flows through Worcestershire and Gloucestershire.
